item.description:
Welcome:

We are a group of individuals who enjoy speaking and practicing our French. Our members have all levels and abilities and we welcome everyone. The group has a monthly meeting and at times attend other cultural events, such as French restaurants, movies, plays and other events.

We request that all members attend meetings regularly. Each person's contribution is important and we all count on and help each other.

See you the first Thursday each month.

group.name: The Providence French Language Meetup Group
